about_the_game:
In Foglit, you are tasked with a daunting mission: to complete the work of your fallen mentor and find a way to escape the cursed and ruined lands of Cirilis, which have imprisoned your people for generations.

 This top-down action roguelite challenges you to explore hand crafted stages with procedurally generated flourishes, battle relentless hordes of monsters, and master a deep rune system to forge your own path to victory.

Each run in Foglit is a step forward. Even in defeat, you'll gather valuable energy that can be used to permanently enhance your abilities through the rune magic system. 

Discover and combine a wide array of runes, each offering unique modifiers to your attack, speed, defense, and more. Experiment with different combinations to create powerful builds that suit your playstyle and overcome increasingly difficult challenges.

As you journey through the blighted lands, you'll uncover fragments of the past, revealing the tragic events that led to the current ruined state. Your choices will have consequences, impacting the story and leading to multiple different endings. Will you confront every boss in your path, or find a way to circumvent them? Renew the covenant. Break the cycle!

Features

  • Challenging Combat: Test your skills against waves of enemies and formidable bosses in fast-paced hack-and-slash combat.

  • Meaningful Progression: Even in defeat, you'll make progress with the rune magic system.

  • Diverse Rune System: Collect and combine runes and adapt to any challenge.

  • Compelling Story: Unravel a dark fantasy narrative filled with lore, mystery, and impactful choices.

  • Pixel Art Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted pixel art world.

    Embark on a journey of perseverance and uncover the secrets of Foglit.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains:
- Depictions of fighting monsters in the main gameplay loop
- Written references to past violent conflicts ( in game world history) and their consequences; mainly: Casualty numbers, descriptions of extreme poverty.
